We checked KGTMS and it seems to be fine as it was setup slightly differently to msra.org.au and we will keep an eye on it.

Thanks Heath. Could I please ask if the KGTMS website was also affected?

Regards

Hi Trish, 

Regarding the issue, it was to do with some recent security updates from Stripe, largely driven by some new regulations applicable to the US, which are being rolled out globally. 

We needed to make some updates to the donation forms credit card details field. You will notice it now uses the Stripe interface. From what we can see (screenshot attached), donations have been steadily coming through. For some reason the Stripe protocol was flagging Scott's credit card as a risk and not letting him transact. Sometimes this occurs if for example, a customer is trying to use a credit card in AU that was issued in another country. This is just one of many situations that can cause Stripe to stop a transaction. 

I hope this gives you more clarity, hopefully he will be able to transact now with the new measures we have put in place.

Thanks Joel. Can you please advise what the issue was and how many people this affected.

Thanks

Trish



Petricia Augustus

I have just spoken to Scott Bloodworth who is a returning regular giver and is having a problem with our donation page, see message below.

In the meantime he will return to our page as he prefers this method, than giving me his CC details!!
Thanks as always,
Neil
